chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 has the above problem:
The charging cable is not working. The test with a friend's cable shows that the charging cable is not working. I am asking for a refund or a new charging cable. Thank you
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We hope you’re doing well. We’re reaching out to let you know that the charging cable that your customer Martin ordered is wrong one.

Please ship a replacement accessory within 48 hours and send us the tracking number. 
If you don’t have the item in stock, or can’t ship it in the next 48 hours, we’ll give them a goodwill gesture of 10.00€ at your expense as stated in our Quality Charter. 

Please note that the new accessory should be delivered to the customer within 5 business days and that the shipment should be tracked, as per the Quality Charter.

We’ll keep an eye out for your response.
Thanks for taking care of this,
Angelica, Back Market Customer Care

Dear BackCare,

We are willing to offer a commercial gesture for this inconvenience with respect to the amount stated at the Quality Charter.

Thank you.

Regards, 
SY

Dear ecomobile

The customer would like to receive a new charging cable.

Can you please send one to the customer?

I would be pleased to receive an answer from you.

Have a nice day.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to send a new charging cable to the customer. We are willing to offer a commercial gesture of 10 euros with respect to the Quality Charter.

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your message.

The customer accepts the partial refund in the amount of 10.00€.

Please initiate the partial refund within 24 hours.

I would be pleased to receive an answer from you.

Have a nice day.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the 10 euros commercial gesture, thank you.

Regards,
YR
